local_intent: Execute a 0.1 m diagonal (45°) push on the T-block during the transfer phase after aligning and setting yaw.
assumptions: Transfer phase: light contact is achievable via ApproachAndAlign without an explicit lower-until-contact step.
Target t_block remains visible before and after the push.
Yaw of 45° is appropriate for the observed diagonal motion.
coherence_with_global: Matches the global sequence segment: align -> set yaw 45 -> push at 45° for 0.1 m; includes pre/post visibility checks consistent with perception-first, act, then verify.
